author: Kayleigh Roberts
title: Chelsea Clinton Is Trolling Donald Trump on Twitter Again
text:
Chelsea Clinton Is Trolling Donald Trump on Twitter Again 
ðŸ˜‚ ðŸ˜‚ ðŸ˜‚ . Getty Advertisement - Continue Reading Below Chelsea Clinton is having a Twitter Renaissance. In recent weeks, she's been calling out some of the more ridiculous claims made by the Trump administration. Clinton's political side has awakened (which isn't super surprising, considering she's the daughter of a former POTUS and a former presidential candidate). Now, she's at it again, responding to a confusing comment Donald Trump made about Sweden during his Florida rally this weekend, Forbes reports. Most Popular "You look at what's happening in Germany," Trump said. "You look at what's happening last night in Swedenâ€”Swedenâ€”who would believe this? Sweden, they took in large numbers, they are having problems like they never thought possible. You look at what's happening Brussels, you look at what's happening all over the world." Clinton's response didn't just take aim at Trump's Sweden statement, it also expertly tied it to Kellyanne Conway's now-infamous reference to the (totally fake) Bowling Green Massacre. What happened in Sweden Friday night? Did they catch the Bowling Green Massacre perpetrators? 
â€” Chelsea Clinton (@ChelseaClinton) February 19, 2017 Keep the political commentary coming, Chelsea. Or, better yet, run for office. Just an idea... Follow Marie Claire on F acebook for the latest celeb news, beauty tips, fascinating reads, livestream video, and more. More from Marie Claire:
